channel.title: Comments on: My first Windows Ada program

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
Here's how to solve Chinese displaying comments and strings problem in gps, other languages may use similar solution: in gps, from menu Edit -> Preferences, in General, make sure Character set is GB2312, in Editor -> Fonts & Colors, use Chinese fonts for "Comments" and "Strings", fonts like MingLiu, SimSun, SimHei, etc.
I won't use Chinese for identifiers so I don't need anything else to be Chinese enabled.
item.content:encoded:
Here’s how to solve Chinese displaying comments and strings problem in gps, other languages may use similar solution: in gps, from menu Edit -> Preferences, in General, make sure Character set is GB2312, in Editor -> Fonts & Colors, use Chinese fonts for “Comments” and “Strings”, fonts like MingLiu, SimSun, SimHei, etc.

I won’t use Chinese for identifiers so I don’t need anything else to be Chinese enabled.

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Too bad, I run into this problem again - seems WordPress does not support codes quite well, I have to dig out how to make it looks better, but later. :)
item.content:encoded: Too bad, I run into this problem again – seems WordPress does not support codes quite well, I have to dig out how to make it looks better, but later. ðŸ™‚
